name: ea-core-gpi-pi
description: Extrae contenido de diferentes fuentes y analiza seg√∫n el modelo <nombre>

scripts.serve-telegram: npm run lint && npm run build-ieom2 &&  cross-env LEVEL=silly EXTRACTOR=telegram-extractor tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./serve
scripts.serve-reddit: npm run lint  && npm run build-ieom2 &&  cross-env LEVEL=silly EXTRACTOR=reddit-extractor tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./serve
scripts.serve-emol: npm run lint  && npm run build-ieom2 &&  cross-env LEVEL=silly EXTRACTOR=emol-extractor tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./serve
scripts.serve-youtube: npm run lint  && npm run build-ieom2 &&  cross-env LEVEL=silly EXTRACTOR=youtube-extractor tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./serve
scripts.serve-twitter: npm run lint  && npm run build-ieom2 &&  cross-env LEVEL=silly EXTRACTOR=twitter-extractor tsnd --respawn -r tsconfig-paths/register ./serve

author: DEV TEAM (PI-GPI-02-2020)
